name: Operation
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation
description:
Operation

Additional information about a potentially long-running operation with which a log entry is associated.

See also Gcloud::Logging::Entry#operation.

methods.name: id
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#id
methods.description: An arbitrary operation identifier. Log entries with the same identifier are assumed to be part of the same operation.

methods.name: id=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#id=
methods.description: An arbitrary operation identifier. Log entries with the same identifier are assumed to be part of the same operation.

methods.name: producer
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#producer
methods.description: An arbitrary producer identifier. The combination of id and producer must be globally unique. Examples for producer: "MyDivision.MyBigCompany.com", "github.com/MyProject/MyApplication".

methods.name: producer=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#producer=
methods.description: An arbitrary producer identifier. The combination of id and producer must be globally unique. Examples for producer: "MyDivision.MyBigCompany.com", "github.com/MyProject/MyApplication".

methods.name: first
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#first
methods.description: Set this to true if this is the first log entry in the operation.

methods.name: first=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#first=
methods.description: Set this to true if this is the first log entry in the operation.

methods.name: last
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#last
methods.description: Set this to true if this is the last log entry in the operation.

methods.name: last=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Entry
Operation#last=
methods.description: Set this to true if this is the last log entry in the operation.
